channel.title: Text on Golang for all
channel.description: Recent content in Text on Golang for all

item.title: GO Templates: Principles and Usage
item.description:
Packages text/template and html/template are part of the Go standard library. Go templates are used in many Go-programmed software â€” Docker, Kubernetes, Helm. Many third-party libraries are integrated with Go templates, for example Echo. Knowing Go template syntax is very useful.

This article consists of text/template package documentation and a couple of author’s solutions. After describing Go template syntax, we’ll dive into text/template and html/template sources.
